'''Ike Morris''' is the father of [[A.J. Morris]], a patient at [[Seattle Grace Mercy West Hospital]].

==History==
===A.J.'s Cancer===
A.J.'s cancer continued to spread even with treatment. Because he was too weak for surgery, [[Miranda Bailey]] suggested genome mapping to make a targeted therapy to treat him. However, the hospital denied their request to have A.J.'s genome mapped by a lab, Arizona said that they'd wait a day for him to improve and then operate, but Dr. Bailey encouraged Ike to take his son elsewhere for the treatment.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
His son, A.J., has cancer. Chemo and radiation had not been effective treatments.
